alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 26 at 10:07AM EST until January 26 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch for a storm total of 4 to 12 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
